name: Desert Army War Operation -Furious Crushing Battle
name_original: Desert Army War Operation -Furious Crushing Battle
description:
Do you love to play with Best Army Commando War Sniper Shooting Games? If yes, here is best Action, Shooting and Army War Battlefield game for you. This is the best shooting game of 2016 in which you have to complete your duty by encountering all the enemies behaving as modern marine commando.
Enemies have started to occupy the different areas of city with modern helicopter, tanks and with other modern weapons. They are with modern pistol,High level machine gun, pump action gun, bullpup rifle, machine gun, automatic shotgun, sniper, light machine gun, mini gun, rpg, slugger, grenade, m64c, cq16, thumper and Gatling gun.

You are not immortal but you have to show immortal Best Army Commando in the battlefield and with wipe out the City and Army base from the enemies. As Enemies have invaded some regions of our northern and southern areas of our city. You are lone army commando and it’s your duty to wipe out the city from enemies.

“Desert Army War Operation” is best sniper shooting game of 2016 and with stunning graphics with a war zone.

Best game features:

- Game is having stunning desert city war zone environment.
- 3D Modern guns with amazing actions.
- Enemies are with modern weapons, helicopters and tanks.
- High Quality Controls.
- Realistic Sounds.

Stay Connected:
